channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Coupang to pay almost $1.2 billion in compensation for data breach
item.description: Victims will get Coupang vouchers of roughly $35 each.

item.title: Nepal Is Throwing Out Its Decade-Old Scheme to Clean Mount Everest
item.description: The world’s tallest peak has a serious trash problem. Officials hope a revised cleanup plan could finally make a difference.

item.title: I got a 4K Blu-ray player, and now I'm thinking of ditching Netflix Premium
item.description: I’ve been using 4K UHD Blu-rays instead of Netflix Premium for a few weeks, but is it really worth it?

item.title: Right-Wing Influencers Rejoice: Trump Admin Gives a Visa to Accused Russian Propagandist
item.description: Dave Rubin, Tim Pool, and Benny Johnson are probably thrilled.

item.title: You’ll Be Able to Not Stream ‘Tron: Ares’ From the Comfort of Your Own Home Next Week
item.description: Disney hopes there'll be better chances for the latest 'Tron' movie to find an audience in streaming.

item.title: The KEF XIO is pricey but worth it if you want a Dolby Atmos soundbar that’s equally skilled at movies and music
item.description: The KEF XIO is a powerful TV speaker that brings refined, cinematic energy to movies and shows, and has class-leading music reproduction. This performance comes with a hefty price, which may feel too high when you consider its lack of inputs or expansion potential.

item.title: AI Ruined Job Applications, So People Are Resorting to Dating Apps to Find Work
item.description: Networking has become the only way to get a job.

item.title: How to watch the Hisense CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images Hisense is perhaps best known for its budget-friendly electronics and appliances, like TVs and refrigerators. But at CES 2025, the China-based company showed its high-end chops with a massive 136-inch micro LED TV, which recently became available for a whopping $100,000. So what's on deck for this year's show? New leadership, for starters. The company has two new hires, including Chief Marketing Officer Sarah Larsen and Chief Commercial Officer James Fishler. In a press release, Hisense said Fishler's experience in home entertainment, appliances and HVAC is ...

item.title: ChatGPT’s Android app now has a real Thinking mode
item.description: Users have been waiting for OpenAI to bring the ChatGPT Thinking toggle to its mobile app, and Android users got their wish.

item.title: Les astronomes auraient enfin découvert une atmosphère autour d'une exoplanète rocheuse !
item.description: L'exploration du Système solaire a montré sa diversité, des volcans d'Io aux geysers d'Encelade. Celle du monde des exoplanètes n'est pas en reste et là aussi, on cherche des traces possibles de formes de vie, ou pour le moins, à comprendre comment celle-ci pourrait apparaître facilement dans...

item.title: Memory shortages could push PS6 release beyond 2027
item.description: Will Sony delay the PlayStation 6 due to the global memory shortage? A new report says its being considered.

item.title: Samsung unveils its new $200 Galaxy A17 5G smartphone, arriving in January
item.description: Samsung will have two new inexpensive mobile devices arriving on the US market next month. The Galaxy A17 5G starts at $199 and will be available on January 7. Arriving on January 8, the Galaxy Tab A11+ will retail for $250. The Galaxy A17 5G has a 6.7” FHD+ Super AMOLED display and is powered by the same Exynos 1330 chip found in the Galaxy A16 5G. The photography setup is also unchanged from last year's model, with a 50MP main camera, 5MP ultrawide, 2MP macro and 13MP selfie lenses. The base model has 4GB of RAM and 128GB of storage, but can be upgraded with up to 2TB of additional storage v...

item.title: Two cybersecurity employees plead guilty to carrying out ransomware attacks
item.description: Two former employees at cybersecurity firms - one of whom was a ransomware negotiator - have pleaded guilty to carrying out a series of ransomware attacks in 2023. The Department of Justice announced the guilty pleas on Tuesday, saying 40-year-old Ryan Goldberg and 36-year-old Kevin Martin extorted $1.2 million in Bitcoin from a medical device […]

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Couples, Ranked by How Much Chemistry They Actually Have
item.description: The grand finale arrives on Netflix December 31, so here's one last look back at the characters' most inconsistently important aspect: their love lives.

item.title: Meta just bought one of the fastest-growing AI startups you’ve probably never heard of
item.description: By acquiring Manus, Meta is reinforcing its strategy of integrating AI agents across messaging, productivity, and business tools. In a year defined by companies pouring shocking sums of money into AI, one more deal squeaked in just before 2026.
